name: Winter Highway Truck Driver Rush 3D Simulator
name_original: Winter Highway Truck Driver Rush 3D Simulator
description:
Winter holiday madness is on! Buckle Up for the offroad truck driving in extreme winter snow. Steer your snow truck on steep mountain roads. Pick & drop passengers from the hill station. Go crazy with the mountain truck in heavy snowfall and rush through the dangerous twists and turns. Drift your 4x4 offroad jeep on stunt ramps to perform outrageous stunts. Enjoy the thrill of mountain hill climbing and super stunt jeep driving with Snow Hill Offroad 4x4 Truck 3D.

Enjoy realistic snowfall on mountains highway; get the thrill of speed stunt driver and perform treacherous air stunts. Start this outrageous uphill adventure to explore the arctic hills town. Haul the big tires on bumpy mud road, skid downhill and avoid obstacles. Park your vehicle at impossible uphill parking spots. Test your off road driving skills with the monster truck driver simulator.
Let the Crazy OffRoad Madness begin!


Features:
10 Challenging missions to enhance your driver skills
Realistic snowfall and fog animation
Passenger Pick & drop and cargo transport missions
Realistic snowy weather for amazing 3D winter environment
